name: Specific-Group Software Solutions
description:
Specific-Group is your partner in custom software and dedicated development. Our mission is to make your organization more efficient and profitable through development resources. Solutions are reliable, secure, and made with you in mind.
 

Project Management: Specific-Group uses Agile and Scrum to monitor development and ensure projects are completed on time and on budget.
 


Dedicated Development: Gain access our pool of talented on-shore and off-shore talent as a cost-effective solution for development.
 


Quality Assurance and Testing: A qualified QA team reviews your software through all stages of development to ensure performance.
 


Talent Matching: Imagine if you had access to top developers all over the world. You won’t have to interview or onboard new candidates ever again.
 


Software Architecture: We improve company productivity with software and applications that easily integrate into your systems.
 


Maintenance and Support: Keep your business operating at high levels. This includes offering security and risk management.
 

 
Whether you need short-term developers to finish a software project or a completely new application from scratch, we offer excellence in all of our partnerships. Protect your data, bring a new product to market, or give employees the tools they need to work more productively. Whatever your needs, our software development team is ready to meet them.
